Chris Vanderloo

Computer Science & Cognitive Science student at Rensselaer

About Me

 

I'm Chris Vanderloo. I've been making websites since 4th grade and programming since 7th. I'm currently attending Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute studying Computer Science and Cognitive Science, and I plan to graduate in the fall of 2021 with a Master's in Computer Science. In my free time, I like to read, work on independent programming projects, and make music. I'm heavily involved in Greek life at school and our campus open-source community.

Portfolio

I try to keep myself busy.

Here's some of the projects I've been working on.

Schedj

An iOS/Android app to bring RPI's Student Information System to mobile platforms, powered by React Native and Node.js.

Links: schedj-frontend schedj-backend

2048 AI

A console-based implementation of the popular game 2048 with a baked-in expectimax AI.

Links: 2048-expectimax
